page.title: 07ADMINISTRATION
page.content: Braunstone has {15000}inhabitants. The {local council}consists of 21 members. It is responsible for 4 local parks - Franklin,Shakespeare,Mossdale Meadows and Holmfield. It is also responsible for the {Civic {Centre. The local town council keeps in touch with the {Blaby District Council}which is responsible for refuse collection, keeping footpaths clean,collecting rates,leisure centres and council housing. The Council has 39 elected members and keeps in touch with Leicestershire County Council which is responsible for roads,schools,the police, the fire service and libraries and museums. The County Council has 85 elected members. The Central Government in London is responsible for other administratiom.
